Message.MsgText: NO_PRIVATE_STORAGE_CWSAF0001E=CWSAF0001E: An internal error has occurred. The OSGi framework does not support private bundle storage, which is required for JPA injection by annotations.
BLUEPRINT_PARSE_EXCEPTION_CWSAF0006E=CWSAF0006E: An exception {1} occurred when parsing the Blueprint configuration file {0}.
Message.Explanation: See the chained exception for details.
Message.UserResponse: See the chained exception for details.

Message.MsgText: COULD_NOT_DELETE_CACHE_FILE_CWSAF0018E=CWSAF0018E: The JPA extender could not delete the cache file {0} in its own private bundle storage.
Message.Explanation: In order to extend a JPA definition, the JPA extender needs to initialize its own private bundle storage.
Message.UserResponse: Investigate why the cache file cannot be deleted.

Message.MsgText: WRITE_FAILURE_BLUEPRINT_CWSAF0003E=CWSAF0003E: An internal error has occurred. An exception occurred when writing the file {0} to the private storage area of the blueprint bundle.
SAX_PARSER_EXCEPTION_CWSAF0004E=CWSAF0004E: An internal error has occurred. Unable to configure a SAX parser.
UNABLE_TO_START_BLUEPRINT_CWSAF0007E=CWSAF0007E: The Blueprint bundle is not running and could not be started due to exception {0}.
Message.Explanation: See the chained exception for details.
Message.UserResponse: See the chained exception for details.

Message.MsgText: COULD_NOT_CREATE_CACHE_FILE_CWSAF0019E=CWSAF0019E: The JPA extender could not create the cache file {0} in its own private bundle storage.
Message.Explanation: In order to extend a JPA definition, the JPA extender needs to initialize its own private bundle storage.
Message.UserResponse: Investigate why the cache file cannot be created.

Message.MsgText: NO_ECS_CWSAF0009E=CWSAF0009E: An internal error has occurred. The JPA container cannot find the required annotation scanning service.
CONCURRENT_SCANNING_CWSAF0039E=CWSAF0039E: An internal error has occurred. The JPA runtime environment received two concurrent requests to scan a bundle.
CREATE_DIRECTORY_FAILURE_BLUEPRINT_CWSAF0002E=CWSAF0002E: An internal error has occurred. Could not create a directory {0} in the private storage area of the blueprint bundle.
BLUEPRINT_READ_EXCEPTION_CWSAF0005E=CWSAF0005E: An exception {1} occurred when reading the Blueprint configuration file {0}.
Message.Explanation: See the chained exception for details.
Message.UserResponse: See the chained exception for details.

Message.MsgText: NO_BLUEPRINT_CWSAF0008E=CWSAF0008E: An internal error has occurred. Cannot find the Blueprint bundle.
GENERAL_EXCEPTION_CWSAF0010E=CWSAF0010E: An unexpected exception occurred when the EBA JPA container attempted to process bundle {0}, version {1} for persistence contexts. Exception {2}
Message.Explanation: The enterprise bundle archive (EBA) Java Persistence API (JPA) cannot process the bundle for persistence contexts.
Message.UserResponse: Investigate the cause of the exception
